tutorial.title: Input Text
tutorial.description: Enter your text, describing the image you envision.

tutorial.title: Generate and Review
tutorial.description: Click 'Generate' to create the image and review it before saving or declining. Keep in mind that each render costs Render Points.

tutorial.title: Save or Decline
tutorial.description: If you're satisfied with the generated image, save it to your backpack. If not, decline it and request another rendering.

tutorial.title: Render Points
tutorial.description: Remember, each render consumes Render Points, which can be earned by interactions with other users or bought in our shop.

tutorial.title: Unleash Your Creativity
tutorial.description: Experiment with different descriptions, refine your text, and explore the power of transforming words into visual representations.
